title: TBO ISL Company Website
desc: Designed and developed a dynamic and informative company website for TBO Consulting Group, showcasing their technology solutions and services while emphasizing our commitment to organizational change and digital transformation

title: PrestoMart E-Commerce Website
desc: Developed and launched an intuitive online platform for Presto Mart LTD, enabling seamless browsing and shopping experiences for customers across various product categories, coupled with efficient order tracking and customer support functionalities

title: Concurrent Download Manager
desc: Concurrent Download Manager (CDM) is a Java-based application that enables concurrent downloading of files from multiple URLs. The application provides a user-friendly interface for managing and monitoring download tasks. I built it to prove my proficiency in Java and will continue to improve upon it as time goes on.

title: Beulah's Development Portfolio
desc: Designed and developed a portfolio website, showcasing proficiency in web development and design with a focus on user experience

title: Todo Application
desc: Built a Todo application using React and TypeScript, demonstrating proficiency in modern web development and delivering a user-friendly interface.

title: Stalking Shadows React Library
desc: A ReactJS library component for creating dynamic text shadows that shift with mouse movement or page scroll.
